TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Sunguc, title = Sunguc, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sunguc} }

S.FORM: = Sunguc/ Sunguc/ Sunguc = Kari ncbeyo ncbeyo riyung ka nii. Mesa ka rudan cbeyo''niqan kesun daha ka seediq biciq hnyegan na. Anu snkuxul riyung menaq ssiyo qhuni sunguc. Mosa milo qhuni baro ma mdaking theyaq qhuni snguc hiya mesa, kiya kesun daha seediq Snsunguc. '' Ya ani wada so scuqi bsiyaq ka kari nii di, kiya ka wada daha so chungiyun hari ka kari nii di. Kesun sunguc nii, kuxul bale puqun seediq ma pkumalu riyung hei seediq duri mesa. So cbeyo de, sunguc nii ka pgmaxun pure begu camac ma sangas, mhada ka hnpure de, ngalun daha baro ka hei camac ma stmuun daha psaun ssiyo hini, kiya ka niqan kingal begu ma kingal sara hei camac ka dumatun daha ido. Cbeyo duri ani naq gino bale begu sunguc ka dmatun ido de, cheya bale daha uqun duri ka rudan cubeyo.

= Songoc/ Songoc/ Songoc = Kari ncbeyo ncbeyo riyong ka nii. Mesa ka rodan cbeyo''niqan keson daha ka seediq biciq hnyegan na. Ano snkoxol riyong menaq ssiyo qhoni songoc. Mosa milo qhoni baro ma mdaking theyaq qhoni sngoc hiya mesa, kiya keson daha seediq Snsongoc. '' Ya ani wada so scoqi bsiyaq ka kari nii di, kiya ka wada daha so chongiyon hari ka kari nii di. Keson songoc nii, koxol bale poqon seediq ma pkomalo riyong hei seediq dori mesa. So cbeyo de, songoc nii ka pgmaxon pore bego camac ma sangas, mhada ka hnpore de, ngalon daha baro ka hei camac ma stmoon daha psaon ssiyo hini, kiya ka niqan kingal bego ma kingal sara hei camac ka domaton daha ido. Cbeyo dori ani naq gino bale bego songoc ka dmaton ido de, cheya bale daha oqon dori ka rodan cobeyo.
